name: Super Looter Deluxe
description:
After a great cataclysm world population is in panic.

You have been ordered by your partner to find things to sell in the pawn shops to feed your 4096 cats.

They are very hungry so LOOT EVERYTHING! 

-------------------------

Game created in 21 hours (recording tbd) for the Miz Jam 1 as a fun exercise on procedural and random generation of items and levels with a touch of humour.

Home you like it!

Music by Silent Partner (Thank you!!)
All assets are from Kenney.nl (Thank you!!)
